snippet: Use of the Darjeeling label on blended teas by foreign wholesalers to be phased out.
abstract: Use of the Darjeeling label on blended teas by foreign wholesalers to be phased out.
lead_paragraph: “Among connoisseurs, few teas surpass a good Darjeeling,” Jim Yardley wrote in The New York Times. “The smooth and mellow taste commands a premium price, and the name itself evokes a bygone era.”

headline.main: Darjeeling Tea Growers Get Protection from E.U.
